name: 4 Home
description:
Help our little square find its way home.

Game made for the Global Game Jam 2019.

A web version with updated puzzles is TBA. We would love to read some comments on what you think of our game!

The soundtrack can be found here: https://soundcloud.com/npetrutes/sets/puzzle-for-home

Team:

  • Larissa Araújo - Level Design / Game Design
  • Natalia Petrutes - OST / Game Design
  • Rafael Giordanno - Programming / Game Design
